message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 16-7-1b, translated into all languages

data.en: UNDP supports public service reforms to promote for inclusive and responsive governance, and particularly leads initiatives to support public service reform in transitions, promoting new and more inclusive social contracts. UNDP engagement also includes supporting the advancement of women’s equal participation and decision-making in political processes and institutions, promoting youth-focused and youth-led development, advance the rights of persons with disabilities, reduction of inequalities and exclusion of indigenous peoples. UNDP Oslo Governance Centre was mandated to support countries to monitor progress on SDG16 and to produce governance statistics which includes the representation and participation in public service.
